title: Eminence Capital Demands Graphic Packaging Bring Back CEO
description: A major Graphic Packaging Holding Co. shareholder is blasting the company’s board for firing its chief executive officer and threatening a “public  campaign” unless that decision is reversed.
content: A major Graphic Packaging Holding Co. shareholder is blasting the company’s board for firing its chief executive officer and threatening a “public  campaign” unless that decision is reversed.
